creator: Alexander Terp
description:
* remove whitespace in empty lines (think gerrit pink)
* Align arg comments, within some threshold of each other
* Blank line between arg declarations and constraints
* remove blank space between keywords and colon e.g. `args  :`
* Add space in between arg comment '#' and contents
* Align cases in switch statements (i.e. align case values)

Also integrate in RLS.

By default, just spit out what it would do.

`-w` to actually write.

Requires valid script i.e. no ERRORs from `rad check`.

`-r` to recurse to connected scripts (via imports) ?
title: RAD-130: rad fmt
